name: Identify the percentage of credit card and cash trips by borough

content.query:
--ENCOURAGE CARD PAYMENT
-- Identify the percentage of credit card and cash trips by borough
-- Datasets to use: trip_data_green_csv, taxi_zone, payment_type
USE nyc_taxi;

SELECT TOP 1000
    borough.Borough,
    --payment_type.payment_type_desc,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS credit_card_trips,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS cash_trips,
    FORMAT(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / COUNT(*), 'N2') AS credit_card_trips_percentage,
    FORMAT(100.0 * COUNT(CASE WHEN trip_data.payment_type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / COUNT(*), 'N2') AS cash_trips_percentage,
    COUNT(*) AS total_trips
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS trip_data
--taxi_zone table
JOIN OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://synapsestore123.dfs.core.windows.net/demo-synapse/taxi_zone.csv',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS borough
ON trip_data.PULocationID = borough.LocationID
JOIN (
    -- payment_type subquery
    SELECT
        JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type') AS payment_type,
        JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc') AS payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    ) WITH (jsonContent NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS payment
) AS payment_type
ON trip_data.payment_type = payment_type.payment_type
WHERE trip_data.payment_type IN (1, 2)
GROUP BY borough.Borough
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
